verses.text: My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* not my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*; but let thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*:

For \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w long|strong="H8141"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, and \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, shall they \w add|strong="H3254"\w* to thee.\f + \fr 3.2 \ft long…: Heb. years of life\f*

Let not \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* thee: \w bind|strong="H7194"\w* them about thy \w neck|strong="H1621"\w*; \w write|strong="H3789"\w* them upon the \w table|strong="H3871"\w* of thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*:

So shalt thou \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* and \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w understanding|strong="H7922"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* and \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.\f + \fr 3.4 \ft good…: or, good success\f*
¶ \w Trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with all thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; and \w lean|strong="H8172"\w* not unto thine own \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*.
In all thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="H3045"\w* him, and he shall \w direct|strong="H3474"\w* thy \w paths|strong="H0734"\w*.

¶ Be not \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* in thine own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

It shall be \w health|strong="H7500"\w* to thy \w navel|strong="H8270"\w*, and \w marrow|strong="H8250"\w* to thy \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.\f + \fr 3.8 \ft health: Heb. medicine\f*\f + \fr 3.8 \ft marrow: Heb. watering, or, moistening\f*
\w Honour|strong="H3513"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with thy \w substance|strong="H1952"\w*, and with the \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w* of all thine \w increase|strong="H8393"\w*:

So shall thy \w barns|strong="H0618"\w* be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w plenty|strong="H7647"\w*, and thy \w presses|strong="H3342"\w* shall burst \w out|strong="H6555"\w* with new \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*.

¶ My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w despise|strong="H3988"\w* not the \w chastening|strong="H4148"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; neither be \w weary|strong="H6973"\w* of his \w correction|strong="H8433"\w*:

For whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* he \w correcteth|strong="H3198"\w*; even as a \w father|strong="H0001"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add in whom\add* he \w delighteth|strong="H7521"\w*.

¶ \w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add that\add* \w findeth|strong="H4672"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and the \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add that\add* \w getteth|strong="H6329"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.\f + \fr 3.13 \ft that getteth…: Heb. that draweth out understanding\f*

For the \w merchandise|strong="H5504"\w* of it \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than the \w merchandise|strong="H5505"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w gain|strong="H8393"\w* thereof than fine \w gold|strong="H2742"\w*.
She \add is\add* more \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* than \w rubies|strong="H6443"\w*: and all the things thou canst \w desire|strong="H2656"\w* are not to be \w compared|strong="H7737"\w* unto her.

\w Length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* in her right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*; \add and\add* in her left \w hand|strong="H8040"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* and \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*.
Her \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \add are\add* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of \w pleasantness|strong="H5278"\w*, and all her \w paths|strong="H5410"\w* \add are\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

She \add is\add* a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w* to them that lay \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* upon her: and \w happy|strong="H0833"\w* \add is every one\add* that \w retaineth|strong="H8551"\w* her.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* hath \w founded|strong="H3245"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; by \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* hath he \w established|strong="H3559"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.\f + \fr 3.19 \ft established: or, prepared\f*

By his \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* the \w depths|strong="H8415"\w* are broken \w up|strong="H1234"\w*, and the \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w* drop \w down|strong="H7491"\w* the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w*.

¶ My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, let not them \w depart|strong="H3868"\w* from thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* sound \w wisdom|strong="H8454"\w* and \w discretion|strong="H4209"\w*:
So shall they be \w life|strong="H2416"\w* unto thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* to thy \w neck|strong="H1621"\w*.
Then shalt thou \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*, and thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* shall not \w stumble|strong="H5062"\w*.

When thou liest \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, thou shalt not be \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w*: yea, thou shalt lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, and thy \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* shall be \w sweet|strong="H6149"\w*.

Be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of \w sudden|strong="H6597"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w*, neither of the \w desolation|strong="H7722"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, when it \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*.
For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be thy \w confidence|strong="H3689"\w*, and shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* from being \w taken|strong="H3921"\w*.

¶ \w Withhold|strong="H4513"\w* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w* from them to whom it is \w due|strong="H1167"\w*, when it is in the \w power|strong="H0410"\w* of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 3.27 \ft them…: Heb. the owners thereof\f*

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* not unto thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, and come \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w*; when thou \w hast|strong="H3426"\w* it by thee.

\w Devise|strong="H2790"\w* not \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, seeing he \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* \w securely|strong="H0983"\w* by thee.\f + \fr 3.29 \ft Devise…: or, Practise no evil\f*
¶ \w Strive|strong="H7378"\w* not with a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* without \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*, if he have \w done|strong="H1580"\w* thee no \w harm|strong="H7451"\w*.

¶ \w Envy|strong="H7065"\w* thou not the \w oppressor|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* none of his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 3.31 \ft the oppressor: Heb. a man of violence\f*

For the \w froward|strong="H3868"\w* \add is\add* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but his \w secret|strong="H5475"\w* \add is\add* with the \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w*.

¶ The \w curse|strong="H3994"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: but he \w blesseth|strong="H1288"\w* the \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w* of the \w just|strong="H6662"\w*.
Surely he \w scorneth|strong="H3887"\w* the \w scorners|strong="H3887"\w*: but he \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* unto the \w lowly|strong="H6035"\w*.

The \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* shall \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: but \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* shall be the \w promotion|strong="H7311"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*.\f + \fr 3.35 \ft shall be…: Heb. exalteth the fools\f*
